title: MediaReduce
description:
MediaReduce - Your all-in-one solution for editing & compressing images, videos, and documents securely and efficiently. The AI powered image and video editor automates your editing needs. You can edit or compress your files both offline and online. 
🎯 Core Features:
• AI-powered video trimming with smart scene detection
• AI-powered Background removal for images
• AI-powered video and image enhancement
• Document editing suite
• Advanced video and image editing tools
• Batch processing
